wikipedia_page.main: Hannah Brown (born 20 February 1990) is a British female canoeist who won three medals at senior level at the Wildwater Canoeing World Championships and one at the Canoe Sprint World Championships.

link_mentions.page: List of ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships medalists in women's kayak
2017 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships – Women's K-2 500 metres
2017 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships – Women's K-2 200 metres
2018 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships – Women's K-4 500 metres
Canoeing at the 2020 Summer Olympics – Women's K-4 500 metres
2019 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships – Women's K-4 500 metres
